title: Love Island's Amber Gill appears VERY worse-for-wear inside her raucous MissPap clothing line launch
text:
Love Island star Amber Gill appeared to enjoy the revelry of her MissPap clothing line launch earlier this week, as she was filmed putting on a raucous display.

The former beautician, 22, was seen in a video shared by her co-star Yewande Biala, 23, leaning forward and whispering to a male companion before seemingly being helped to stand by a fellow reveler and singing into the camera.

While Yewande deleted the clip, Twitter users swiftly picked up and shared the video while marvelling at her bleary-eyed state, as she appeared to get into the swing of the wild night out among her friends and co-stars.

Wild: Love Island star Amber Gill appeared to enjoy the revelry of her MissPap clothing line launch earlier this week, as she was filmed putting on a raucous display

Amber looked sensational for her evening on the town as she showed off a new sleek hairdo, in a huge departure from her trademark tight ringlets.

The night started with the stunner wowing in a glittering minidress to celebrate her £1million deal with the fast fashion clothing brand.

Yet debauchery swiftly descended as her villa-mate filmed the stunner in her seemingly bleary-eyed state as she danced in a stumbling fashion.

Proving her popularity among her fellow Islanders, Amber was also supported by a large number of her co-stars, including Anna Vakili, Amy Hart and Molly-Mae Hague.

Animated: The former beautician, 22, was seen in a video shared by her co-star Yewande Biala, 23, leaning forward and whispering to a male companion before seemingly being helped to stand by a fellow reveler and singing into the camera

Shocker: Yet debauchery swiftly descended as her villa-mate filmed the stunner in her seemingly bleary-eyed state as she danced in a stumbling fashion

Wild: She was getting up close and personal with a fellow partygoer

She was dancing her way through the evening while Yewande took the camera role.

With the Love Island crown and a series of business ventures already under her belt, the successful star has now launched her collection with the online fashion retailer.

Speaking about her new range, Amber told MailOnline: 'I was really part of the design process so it’s really good to see it all come out tomorrow.

'I love the flowy mini dress that’s currently on the billboard, as well as a black ruched mini dress. I couldn’t possibly pick one.

'The collection channels my style, it’s for party girls. It’s very inclusive too, it’s from size 6-26 which was really important to me. Having something for everyone really means a lot to me.'

The winner takes it all: Amber looked sensational for her evening on the town as she showed off a new sleek hairdo, in a huge departure from her trademark tight ringlets

Striking: The gorgeous reality star was sporting a brand new 'do for the occasion, swapping her blonde curls (right) for a wig featuring dark, tumbling waves (left)

The striking campaign - which sees the fierce bombshell model a selection of her sensational ensembles - was shot in Miami, and Amber has gushed 'the vibe' of the sunny city 'matched the collection'.

On her stance with body confidence, she encouraged fans to 'be who you are' as 'everyone's unique'.

The pint-sized star elaborated: 'I don’t think I’ve ever had issues with body confidence, I always think that people are unique and you are what you are...

She means business! Amber has lifted the lid on life after Love Island as she launches her new clothing collection with fashion retailer MissPap, available from Thursday

'Everyone’s different, so there’s no point of comparing yourself to others. I’ve always been confident because I am what I am.'

On her next steps, Amber teased: 'I’ll be releasing another collection with MissPap, and I’m going to make a YouTube channel which will show my personality, you can’t really see that on Instagram.

'People want to see me being daft. There’s other things coming up, I can’t say right now.

'I need to think about where I would film my YouTube and things like that, I need a room dedicated to making videos and a place to put all my clothes, so I’m currently looking. I’m really looking forward to it.'
description: The former beautician, 22, was seen in a video shared by her co-star Yewande Biala, 23, leaning forward and whispering to a male companion
